name: StomaccAndFriends
description:
-CONTROLS-

  • can be played with WASD or  ZQSD or arrows
  • G to toggle microsoft gamepad
  • U/I/O/P to spawn friends
  • M to toggle sound
  • R to restart level (should not be necessary)
  • H to activate hard mode in first level

-RESSOURCES-

  • made with GameMaker 1.4
  • sounds generated with SFXR http://drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html
  • music made with OpenMpt https://openmpt.org/
  • Monserrat font https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Montserrat

Stomacc and Friends was made for pot-au-jeu gamejam

Have fun and let me know how many times Stomacc digested: the less the better your score ;)
